name: attendance-app-root
description: Root package for the attendance app

scripts.build: mkdir -p build-app && cp -r app/* build-app/ && cd build-app && npm install --production=false && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && cd .. && mkdir -p dist/public && cp -r build-app/dist/public/* dist/public/ && cp build-app/dist/server.js dist/server.js
